properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keedu yuddamu thegulu karuvainanu Daadi cheya booni vijrombinchinapudu Neevu morapettina neeku Doruku nijamugaa rakshana{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shatru shodhanalu paibadinappudu Shakhti heenulamaipoyi nappudu Kreestu dayacheyu nityaadharaana Nijamugaa chooturu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu yuddamu cheyu naayakudu Prabhu pakshamandu cherumu Eenaade neevu pondedavu Berakaalo nijamugaa jayamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paluvidha shramalandu cherumaa Preeti meera mimmu daricherchunu Neethi yukhtamugaa stutinchumu Khyaatitho prabhuni{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nitya devuni mahaa krupa Niratam shatruvunu jayinchunu Nishchayam kruthajnathaa stutulu Meeru nityamugaa chellinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swaramandala sitaaraa vayinchudi Shatruvulatho prabhu porusalpenu Berakaalo prabhu swarameththi Mari mari paadudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parama thandri prasaadinchu Nemmadi bhooraajulu gada gada Vanikiri thana prajalanu santhosha Paruchunu Halleluya paadudi{/lang-eng}
